metadata.title: in-Ear Gaming Headset with Dual mic (Detachable Boom mic and in-line mic), for Mobile & PC with 3.5mm connectivity, Great for Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, PS5, PS4, Switch. Includes PC Splitter.
features: Great to have when your wireless headsets run out of charge.
Includes detachable boom mic and an in-line mic for more options.
Portable and light-weight. Battle your friends at home or take them to any esports tournament.
3 different size ear tips are included to provide a secure fit and noise-isolation blocking out that unwanted environment noise.
Not into gaming as much? Simply use thse headsets for your next zoom, or teams meeting.
Enjoy gaming with a wired connection using a 3.5mm direct connect. Mobile gaming and or console gaming.
description: Gaming Headset (3.5mm wired earbuds) with detachable boom mic. Includes in-line mic with volume controls for music playback. Compatible with Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One and PC with a 3.5mm direct connection. PC splitter included.

title: Gaming headset earbuds
